name: Seesaw Simulator 19
description:
Created for Minijam 34: Balance - Limitiation: Two Button Controls

Use the Left and Right arrows to control two characters and see-saw your way to collect Jammy Carts and avoid the Buzz Saws. 

Seesaw Simulator 19 is best played with a friend! One player takes the left key, the other takes the right!

There are two game modes:

  • Cooperative
    • Both sides share a score and a pool of lives. When you run out - the game will return to the main menu.
  • Competitive
    • Each side must try to defeat the other. First to 5 wins claims victory. The game will return to the main menu after the victor is declared.

Music from https://filmmusic.io
"Windswept" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)
